## Read 5% train data

```{r}
traindata <- read.csv("bike_weather_train_5perc.csv")
str(traindata)
summary(traindata)

```

## Re-organize to count frequency of use per day of year

```{r}

library(plyr)
daily_study <- ddply(traindata,.(traindata$start_year,traindata$start_mth,traindata$start_day,Ave.Wind.Speed,TMIN...C. ,TMAX...C. ,  PRCP..mm. , SNOW..mm.),nrow)
#daily_study$Ave.Wind.Speed <- traindata$Ave.Wind.Speed[match(traindata$start_year,daily_study$start_year)]
str(daily_study)


```

## Re-organize to count frequency of use per station

library(plyr)

#daily_study$Ave.Wind.Speed <- traindata$Ave.Wind.Speed[match(traindata$start_year,daily_study$start_year)]
